com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.model.tracker
Class CxArtifactFieldDependenciesRule

java.lang.Object
  com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.model.CxFromServer
      com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.model.tracker.CxArtifactFieldDependenciesRule

public class CxArtifactFieldDependenciesRule
extends CxFromServer

CxArtifactFieldDependenciesRule is the class for field dependencies. Field dependencies are link between the values of two fields. You can set you tracker some rules saying that a given value for a given field will allow others value for another field.
